snippet: A civil trial began in Brooklyn on Tuesday to determine whether the city can be held liable for Hailey Gonzalez’s violent death at the hands of her mother’s boyfriend.
abstract: Civil trial begins in Brooklyn to determine whether New York City can be held liable for Hailey Gonzalez’s violent death at the hands of her mother’s boyfriend in 2007; lawyers for Hailey's estate say city’s Administration for Children’s Services made numerous mistakes that endangered her welfare, which may have contributed to her death.
lead_paragraph: A civil trial began in Brooklyn on Tuesday to determine whether the city can be held liable for Hailey Gonzalez’s violent death at the hands of her mother’s boyfriend.

headline.main: City’s Safety Net on Trial Over a Baby Killed in ’07
headline.print_headline: City’s Safety Net on Trial Over a Baby Killed in ’07
